customer_service.customer_app module

class customer_service.customer_app.User(**kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

Represents a user in the database.

Parameters:

  • full_name (str) – Full name of the user

  • username (str) – Unique username (acts as primary key)

  • password (str) – Hashed password of the user

  • isadmin (bool) – Indicates whether the user is an administrator (default: False)

  • age (int) – Age of the user

  • address (str) – Address of the user

  • gender (str) – Gender of the user

  • marital_status (str) – Marital status of the user

  • wallet_balance (float) – Wallet balance of the user (default: 0.0)

query: t.ClassVar[Query]

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

customer_service.customer_app.charge_customer(username)[source]

Charges a specified amount to the customer’s wallet.

Parameters:

username (str) – The username of the customer

Returns:

JSON response with a success or error message
